LanguageData.MineableOEObsidian.label: obsidian ore
LanguageData.MineableOEMythril.label: mythril ore
LanguageData.MineableOEPlatinum.label: platinum ore
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlimeHive_Core.label: core chaos slime hive
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlimeHive_Core.description: A core hive of dangerous chaos slimes. If activated, it will spawn additional chaos slimes and smaller hives over time.
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlimeHive_Small.label: small chaos slime hive
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlimeHive_Small.description: A small hive of dangerous chaos slimes. If activated, it will spawn additional chaos slimes.
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlimeHive_Medium.label: medium chaos slime hive
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlimeHive_Medium.description: A medium hive of dangerous chaos slimes. If activated, it will spawn additional dangerous chaos slimes.
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlimeHive_Big.label: big chaos slime hive
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlimeHive_Big.description: A big hive of dangerous chaos slimes. If activated, it will spawn additional very dangerous chaos slimes.
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlimeHive_Giant.label: giant chaos slime hive
LanguageData.OE_ChaosSlimeHive_Giant.description: A giant hive of dangerous chaos slimes. If activated, it will spawn additional Chaos Slime the Invincible.
